title: Sharonchy
author: Sharonchy
content: The Yellow River Bridge in Zhengzhou had a rapid buildup of fog on Wednesday morning, which led to a traffic accident involving the collision of several cars, according to Zhengzhou officials, as reported by CCTVThe state CCTV and rescuers both stated that one person was killedIt is also believed that the collision was caused by icy road conditions.Since then, the bridge is now totally blocked off by police.How can we prevent such incidents from reoccurring

comments.author: ModestyKK
comments.body: Due to the icy road surface, vehicles collided in a row. In this special weather like rain and fog, is there no management department of the bridge to investigate the road surface? Vehicles will also be allowed to pass. As long as the car in front does not stop and slows down, the car behind will also slow down naturally. Parking and braking is the most irrational behavior.
